description: The IAlice interface declares set(uint) but the Alice contract implements set(int). This type mismatch causes different function selectors, so when AliceCaller calls IAlice(alice).set(value), the function signature doesn't match and the fallback function is executed instead.
fix_description: Ensure interface function signatures exactly match the implementation. Change IAlice.set(uint) to set(int) or vice versa to match the actual implementation.
